codeSystems.name: AddressType
codeSystems.title: AddressType
codeSystems.description: The type of an address (physical / postal).

codeSystems.name: AddressUse
codeSystems.title: AddressUse
codeSystems.description: The use of an address.

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.title: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.description: Telecommunications form for contact point.

codeSystems.name: ContactPointUse
codeSystems.title: ContactPointUse
codeSystems.description: Use of contact point.

codeSystems.name: DaysOfWeek
codeSystems.title: DaysOfWeek
codeSystems.description: The days of the week.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: LinkType
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

codeSystems.name: LocationMode
codeSystems.title: LocationMode
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

codeSystems.name: LocationStatus
codeSystems.title: LocationStatus
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

codeSystems.name: NameUse
codeSystems.title: NameUse
codeSystems.description: The use of a human name.

codeSystems.name: AbsentAndUnknownDataUvIps
codeSystems.title: Absent and Unknown Data - IPS
codeSystems.description: International Patient Summary (IPS) codes for "known absent" and "not known" data.

codeSystems.name: SNOMED_CT
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

codeSystems.name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

codeSystems.name: ConditionVerificationStatus
codeSystems.title: ConditionVerificationStatus
codeSystems.description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

codeSystems.name: ContactEntityType
codeSystems.title: Contact entity type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

codeSystems.name: LocationType
codeSystems.title: Location type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.This includes several 'non physical' codes which are still considered a location.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationType
codeSystems.title: Organization type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a type of organization.

codeSystems.name: BedStatus
codeSystems.title: bedStatus
codeSystems.description: Code system of concepts which specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DLD and PV1 segments.

codeSystems.name: ContactRole2
codeSystems.title: contactRole2
codeSystems.description: Code system of concepts which specify a relationship role that the next of kin/associated parties plays with regard to the patient. Also used in referrals, for example, it may be necessary to identify the contact representative at the clinic that sent a referral. Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the NK1 and CTD segments after 2.5, when it replace 2.16.840.1.113883.18.57.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierType
codeSystems.title: identifierType
codeSystems.description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.title: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description:
\* \* \* No description supplied \* \* \*

*Open Issue:* The specific meanings of these codes can vary somewhat by jurisdiction and implementation so caution should be used when determining equivalency.

*Open Issue:* fixing and completion of the hierarchy and proper good definitions of all the concepts is badly needed.

codeSystems.name: NullFlavor
codeSystems.title: NullFlavor
codeSystems.description: A collection of codes specifying why a valid value is not present.

codeSystems.name: RoleCode
codeSystems.title: RoleCode
codeSystems.description: A set of codes further specifying the kind of Role; specific classification codes for further qualifying RoleClass codes.

codeSystems.title: CodeSystem-IdentifierType_V20203
codeSystems.description: 识别码类型编码系统

codeSystems.title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
